protocol: Locate insertion point. First, identify the location of the artery which is half the distance from the anterior superior iliac spine to ther pubic tubercle
zcandidates: identify where your artery is , which is 50 percent from your anterior superior spine to your pubic tubercle

protocol: Then go one finger breadth medial to that to identify the location of  the femoral vein
zcandidates: Identify those with those fingers , then draw an imaginary line , 50 percent of that distance is your artery , and then you go one finger breadth medially to that , and that 's where your vein is
